name: megablst
story:
Megablast (??????) is a 1989 horizontally scrolling shooter released in arcades in 1989 by Taito in Europe and Japan. One or two players can control space fighters assigned to deal with an alien invasion using incredible firepower through eight stages. Many of the game's mini-bosses resemble previous Taito game characters.

The game was re-released for the PlayStation 2 as part of Taito Memories II Gekan in 2007.
